visas.key_consideration: Digital nomad visa allows for stays up to one year, renewable, with no local tax on foreign income.

income_requirement.misc_details: Minimum monthly income requirement: $3,000 for individuals and $4,000 for families.

application_fee.details: The application fee includes $100 for the government application and $90 for the issuance of the immigration document.

visas.tax_residency_trigger_details: You are considered a tax resident if you stay for longer than 183 days in a calendar year.
visas.renewability_details: The visa is renewable for an additional year if you meet the requirements and have spent at least 80 days in Costa Rica during the first year.
visas.special_tax_regime_details: Digital nomads are exempt from paying income tax on foreign-sourced income.
visas.permanent_residency_details: The digital nomad visa does not lead to permanent residency.
